events.message: I received my order yesterday but the item is the wrong size. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request concerns a refund due to receiving an incorrect-sized product.
Assigning the refund request case to the returns processing team for further assistance.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you received the wrong size and would like a refund. Let's get this resolved for you.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I attached photos showing the size label and the item itself for your review.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and send you instructions on how to return the item at no cost.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the free return and refund process. Looking forward to resolving this soon.
The refund has been issued to your original payment method. Please check your account and let us know if you encounter any issues.
We are following up to ensure that your refund was received and that everything is now satisfactory with your order experience.
Thank you for confirming receipt of your refund. We are closing this case now, and please feel free to contact us if you need any further help.
